game.name: The Witcher 3
game.text: An open-world RPG set in a medieval fantasy world, known for its story-driven gameplay.

game.name: Minecraft
game.text: A sandbox game where players build and explore virtual worlds made of blocks.

game.name: Grand Theft Auto V
game.text: An action-adventure game with open-world gameplay, focusing on crime and heists.

game.name: Fortnite
game.text: A battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing.

game.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
game.text: A free-to-play battle royale game from the Call of Duty franchise.

game.name: League of Legends
game.text: A multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game, known for its strategic depth and team play.

game.name: Among Us
game.text: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together to find the imposter.

game.name: Apex Legends
game.text: A free-to-play battle royale game known for its fast-paced gameplay and unique character abilities.

game.name: Valorant
game.text: A tactical first-person shooter that blends precise gunplay with unique agent abilities.

game.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
game.text: An open-world action-adventure game set in the American Wild West, known for its storytelling.

game.name: Cyberpunk 2077
game.text: An open-world RPG set in a dystopian future, featuring a vast, immersive world.

game.name: Pokemon Sword & Shield
game.text: A role-playing game where players catch and battle creatures called Pok√©mon in a new region.

game.name: Super Mario Odyssey
game.text: A 3D platformer where Mario travels across different kingdoms to save Princess Peach.

game.name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
game.text: An action-adventure game set in a re-imagined Japan, featuring intense swordplay and stealth.

game.name: Fall Guys
game.text: A battle royale-style party game where players compete in obstacle courses.

game.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
game.text: An open-world RPG set in the fantasy world of Tamriel, with dragons and deep exploration.

game.name: Horizon Zero Dawn
game.text: An action RPG where players explore a post-apocalyptic world filled with robotic creatures.

game.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
game.text: A life simulation game where players live on an island and interact with anthropomorphic animals.
